Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute at Roosevelt/Cicero
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Harrison, Laramie, 16th and Cicero: due to police activity near Roosevelt/Cicero
